longBusinessSummary: Bank of Cyprus Holdings Public Limited Company, through its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of banking, financial, and insurance services in Cyprus, Greece, the United Kingdom, the United States, Germany, Romania, Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, and internationally. The company offers current, demand, savings, sight, quick, and fixed deposits; housing, student, vehicle, mortgage, consumer, and business and business premises loans; and trade finance facilities, Escrow, and project finance services, as well as hire purchase services for car and equipment. It also provides debit, credit, prepaid, and special cards; reward programs; digital products; digital banking, and payments and services; insurance products; cash flow management, trade facilities; digital economic platform; market execution, hedging, and custody; investment products; investment banking and brokerage; and asset and wealth management services. In addition, the company involved in the property trading and development activities; land development and operation of a golf resort; administration of guarantees and holding of real estate properties; collection of the existing portfolio of receivables, including third party collections; and provision of card processing transaction, auction, and secretarial services. Bank of Cyprus Holdings Public Limited Company was founded in 1899 and is headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus.
